revised_title: Investigating the Influence of the Condenser on Ruhmkorff Coil Efficiency
tldr: The author investigates the effect of the condenser on the working of a Ruhmkorff coil and finds that the efficiency is lower than 45% under tested conditions. The condenser stores energy from the magnetic field and influences the oscillations and spark length in the coil. The results suggest that the connection of the condenser directly across the primary may not be optimal for obtaining good results.
